Translations.Text: Any charity vi don charitable pledge vi fulfill DI est fully aware thereof! As por wicked ili ne hav helpers
Vi deklar your charities ili est ankoraux bon! Vi keep them anonim don them poor est bon vi remits plur de your pek! DI EST fully Cognizant DE CXIO VI do
(Vi ne est responsible por direkt anyone. DI est NUR UNU DIREKT whoever chooses DIREKT)! Any charity vi don est your own bon Any charity vi don est DI. Any charity vi don repaid vi malplej injustice

Charity ir poor sufer ig DI kaj ne emigrate! unaware maj opini ili est ricx due al their dign. Vi recognize them nepr sign; ili neniam beg popol persistently. Whatever charity vi don DI est fully aware thereof
Those don charity nokt tag secretly publicly ricev their recompense their Lord ili hav nothing tim nor vol ili grieve
